Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.

Description: On Rt. 690 in the County of Loudoun, in the vicinity of Otley Rd; Rt. 701E/W (Loudoun County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. The north through lanes are closed. The south through lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Closed
